title: SoudaK’s Art Blog
content:
[[include theme:fish]]

[[=]]
+++ __ADELLE/SOUDAK’s SCP ART PAGE__
[[/=]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]


> [[=]]
> **3/22/2024:**
> [[/=]]
> HELLO, WELCOME TO MY ART PAGE!!!!!!!!!! MY NAME IS ADELLE, OR WHATEVER IS IN MY DISCORD STATUS @adieualle !!!!! 
> 
> I LOVE SCP AND HAVE BEEN A LONG TIME FAN.
> 
> I HAVENT AUTHORED ANY SCPS AS OF 3/22/2024, BUT SOMETIME IN THE FUTURE I MAY!
> 
> CONTACT ME ON DISCORD IF YOU WANNA BE FRIENDS :] OR FOR MY OTHER SOCIAL MEDIAS
> 
> **DISCLAIMER:** I love making doodle pages of SCPs, but due to my deletion of many old artworks and accounts I lack many content to show.. Expect more in the future or as time goes on.


[[=]]
+++ ARTWORK
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block | name= https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/877756692538990662/1220830018725220512/IMG_7202.png?ex=66105d8e&is=65fde88e&hm=9f88e5cf531ee452c6882ab2b6fba81320933f0c57562b9da2c48683138039c6& | caption=SCP DOODLE PAGE | width=WIDTH-GOES-HERE]]

[[=]]
INFO: Just a doodle page, expect more to come…
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block | name= https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/877756692538990662/1220085074276389026/IMG_7164.jpg?ex=660da7c5&is=65fb32c5&hm=93c8f3d5ee745b1cf6f9f9d4a43c0520cb083b805f6a018a51bd4aff50b463a6& | caption=SCP-035 MASK, HANDMADE BY ME! | width=WIDTH-GOES-HERE]]

[[=]]
Mask made some time in 2019-2020? Unsure. Took me about 2-3 weeks. Completely handmade, no bases used other than a mannequin head.
[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block | name= https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/877756692538990662/1220094465981677588/IMG_7171.png?ex=660db084&is=65fb3b84&hm=58b5cc77bd4712c64fa1294e7a79c389d1ddcb14c0fe757333fafb8c9ad19cd9& | caption=SCP-049 and 049-J! | width=WIDTH-GOES-HERE]]

[[=]]
Once again, another doodle. Majority of my art is funny little doodles of chibi SCPs, so expect mostly that.. You can also expect some more detailed art in the future!
[[/=]]

—


> [[=]]
> **3/28/2024**
> [[/=]]
> 
> I FORGOT TO UPDATE HELPPPP
> OK so not much art has been happening ive been mostly focusing on my arg… but heres a doodle lol

[[include component:image-block | name= https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/935756946580049930/1222917200755822592/IMG_7210.jpg?ex=6617f565&is=66058065&hm=463e7494f5c0a7259fccc7e59aa04b3dee25ffd895e0e842670bd680b9b25de1& | caption=babe they’re watching lets go to dms | width=WIDTH-GOES-HERE]]

[[=]]
just a messy sketch of 035 and 049… i think you guys can tell i like these two (im not one of those 035x049 people please dont kill me!) LOL
[[/=]]

[[=]]
+++ MORE TO COME.. LIKELY TO BE UPDATED DAILY.
[[/=]]
author: SoudaK
